solution_line_template: After {new_students} new students joined the class at the start of the school year, the number of students increased to {initial_students}+{new_students} = <<{initial_students}+{new_students}={students_after_joining}>>{students_after_joining}

However, at the end of the year, {transfer_fraction}*{students_after_joining} = <<{transfer_fraction}*{students_after_joining}={transferred_students}>>{transferred_students} students had transferred from the school.

The total number of students remaining in the school at the end of the year is {students_after_joining}-{transferred_students} = <<{students_after_joining}-{transferred_students}={remaining_students}>>{remaining_students}
